title: Fixed example code in README.md
body: Example code now correctly declares a fbgl_t buffer and passes it to relevant functions, also, fbgl_get_{width,height} are renamed to the kernel functions fb_get_{width,height} as a library-provided wrapper is non-existent (and probably unnecessary).
author: dario-loi

comments.body: Thanks @dario-loi im merging the commits and also will add you in contributors list in .h file when i log in to my computer, much appreciated üôè

satisfaction_conditions: Acknowledgment of the code corrections in the README.md file
Acceptance of the pull request containing the fixes
